about_the_game:
Olivier Derivière is a virtuoso and nonconformist, and his captivating music has already left its mark on many famous video games.

Vampire: The Masquerade – Swansong is perhaps Olivier's most personal soundtrack, with a blend of jazz, rock and even hip hop that brings the game characters to life and instils a unique atmosphere.

1 The Night Has Come 03:36
2 Anger Of Death 04:12
3 Free Of You 04:52
4 The Snake 02:24
5 Investigation 01:59
6 Old Memories 01:27
7 Broken Mind 04:10
8 Play With A Prey 01:46
9 Everybody Hurts 02:28
10 Scattered Trauma 01:04
11 Nightmare 02:19
12 The Old Inquisition 02:06

Music composed and produced by Olivier Derivière

“The Night Has Come”
Vocals by
Leonel Silva
Natalia Suvorina
Nychelle M. Edwards

“Free Of You”
Vocal by
VAYY

Guitars Giani Caserotto, Francois Masciopinto
Saxophone by Jordi Asensio

Music Editor Maxime Gautier
Mastered by Shawn Hatfield

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes intense violence, blood and gore, including decapitation, dismemberment and torture. It also contains content of a sexual nature, partial nudity, coarse language and references to drug use.
